tooltip.magical_obsession.magic_dust: §5Pink powder of redstone, dye, and crushed amethyst shard.
tooltip.magical_obsession.suspended_reds: §5Look's like a redstone, but has different use.
gui.jei.description.special_cauldron: The power of this cauldron is not revealed yet, be aware before you use it.
gui.jei.description.magical_cauldron: Cauldron covered by gold stripe, probably gonna be more danger than last one.
gui.jei.description.magical_catallyzator: Using the power of magic, this thing can bring a super powerful tools in your world, as long as you keep it stable.
gui.jei.description.magical_field_shield: This thing will help keep your maurons stable, and advance more progress in magic.
gui.jei.description.entity_duplicator: Can copy most of entities, you just need a jar, and a soul.
gui.jei.description.magical_pentagram: Use your magical knowledge to protect yourself or either...
gui.jei.description.magic_dust: I don't know how to use this, but there should be something about it in a book.
gui.jei.description.suspended_redstone: Probably was obtained from ancient redstone ores, but is there's any of those? This thing doesn't work as redstone.
gui.jei.description.nugget: Nuggets can be obtained by destroying Terra Ore.
gui.jei.description.mob_soul: Mob Souls are used to duplicate entities on duplicator.
gui.jei.description.immolation_sword: Use it to sacrifice a mob, and duplicate it's soul.
advancements.magical_obsession.first_one: Find a way to obtain your first magical stuff
Finally, you can start making some magical stuff
message.magical_obsession.player.tip: §5I fell asleep and had a dream about some strange cauldron. I put some §omagic powder§r§5 in it. I can't remember what happened next, should i try and repeat it?
message.magical_obsession.player.immolat: §5You feel a sudden burst of energy.
